data.title: Denver Nuggets
data.meta_description: Prices typically range from $2,250 -$4,500 for Denver Nuggets suites. Prices will vary based on day of game, opponent, and the location of the suite.

Our 100% Guarantee

No matter what happens, Suite Experience Group has you covered - your suite will be protected by our 100% Guarantee.

The SEG 100% Guarantee

We guarantee you will receive your suite tickets in time for your event. In the extremely rare case that you do not, we will offer you an alternative option if available or we will refund you at least 100% of your total purchase price.

If the event is canceled or if fans are no longer permitted, you may choose to receive a full refund or a credit towards a future SEG purchase.

If the event date changes, you will receive the suite you purchased for the new date.

Please reach out to us if you have any further questions at [email protected] or 800-592-7043.

Denver Nuggets Suite Prices and Details

How much do Denver Nuggets suites cost?

Denver Nuggets luxury suite rentals cost between $5,000 - $10,500 per game on average. That's typically the cost for a 20 person suite for a single Nuggets game. Nuggets luxury suite pricing does vary on the opponent, day of the week, and suite location inside Ball Arena.

How many guests can fit in a Nuggets suite?

Luxury Suites for the Denver Nuggets hold 20 guests per suite. This capacity is similar for nearly all suites at Ball Arena, spanning across both Club Level suites and Lower Level suites. The luxury boxes are fully private to your group and have comfortable seating and amenities in the suite.

Suite Levels at Ball Arena

Club Level Suite

20 Tickets

5 Parking

Catering Available

√ó

Club Level Suite Details

Club Level Luxury Suites at the Pepsi Center are located on the higher of the two main suite levels. Club Level suites typically include 20 tickets and feature interior/exterior seating including a private viewing balcony with theater-style seats. A wet bar, a refrigerator, and an ice-maker come standard in all suites as well as high definition flat screen televisions, a local phone service, and a shared suite attendant. Club Level suites are individually climate-controlled.

To book a Club Level Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Party Suite

20-40 Tickets

Catering Available

√ó

Party Suite Details

Party Suites at Ball Arena are joinable spaces for larger groups. Party Suites are located on each suite level (corner ice).

To book a Party Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Ice Deck

8 Tickets

4 Parking

Food & Beverage Included

√ó

Ice Deck Details

The Ice Deck at Ball Arena is a premium seating offering situated at ice level.

To book an Ice Deck

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Lower Level Suite

16-28 Tickets

5 Parking

Catering Available

√ó

Lower Level Suite Details

Lower Level Suites feature interior and exterior seating including a private viewing balcony with theater-style seats overlooking the floor. Suites on the Lower Level contain a private in-suite restroom. A wet bar, refrigerator, and an ice-maker come standard in all suites as well as high definition flat screen televisions, a local phone service, and a shared suite attendant. Lower Level Suites are individually climate-controlled.

To book a Lower Level Suite

Click on the event you wish to attend in the UPCOMING EVENTS section.

Ball Arena Event Planning Guide

Catering

All Denver Nuggets suites can be catered with food and drinks, including alcohol. On average, most people spend around $80-$100 per person on in-suite catering. There is no minimum and ordering in advance is optional. A Nuggets suite attendant will assist you with any game-day orders.

√ó

Catering Details

Following a Denver Nuggets suite purchase, you will be provided with the suite menu and necessary order forms to complete your order. A pre-order deadline is typically one week prior to the date of your event. You won't be charged for what you ordered until day of the event. If needed, you can also order food and drinks from the suite through your suite attendant.

Parking and Transportation

Denver Nuggets luxury suites include VIP parking passes in lots near the Ball Arena's suite entrance. VIP lots include the Toyota Tundra Lot, Toyota Corolla Lot and Toyota Camry Lot. Lots at Ball Arena open three hours prior to events. Ride-share pick-up and drop-off is located on Chopper Circle.

Budget

Most Denver Nuggets luxury suite rentals will cost between $3,000-$6,000 on average. A Nuggets suite is due in full at the time of purchase. Catering for the Nuggets luxury box wouldn't be due until the day of the game. Catering on average could cost between $80-$100 per person.

Club Access

Denver Nuggets suite ticket holders are granted access to Ball Arena clubs. There are two main club lounges on the KeyBank Club Level in addition to other premium amenities, such as upgraded food and beverage stands, private restrooms, and concierge kiosks available to Nuggets suite guests.

√ó

Arena Club Details

Land Rover Denver Club ‚Äì The Land Rover Denver Club is open to all suite ticket holders during games and concerts. This lounge space features a blend of rustic and modern d√©cor with a full-service bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy craft beer and local cocktails while taking advantage of comfortable seating and over 20 HDTVs. The Land Rover Denver Club is located across from Club seating sections 202-204.

Colorado Social ‚Äì Colorado Social, also located on KeyBank Club Level, provides a full-service bar and restaurant with floor-to-ceiling windows and an outdoor patio with views of the mountains and downtown Denver.

Dress Code

There is no formal dress code in a Denver Nuggets luxury suite. All of the Nuggets suites are climate-controlled and include a coat closet. For corporate events, most guests will dress in business casual attire; however, many suite guests wear casual clothing or team-branded apparel.

Venue Bag Policy

All Nuggets suite guests must adhere to the Ball Arena's official bag policy, which states that bags larger than 14" x 14" x 6", including backpacks, are NOT allowed into Ball Arena. All permitted bags are subject to search upon entry. Nuggets suites do include a closet for small storage.

Entrances

Denver Nuggets luxury suite ticket holders are granted VIP access into the Ball Arena. VIP doors are located to the side of each main entrance area at the Ball Arena. Escalators and elevators to the suite levels are in the Grand Atrium and East Atrium and provide convenient suite access.

Child Ticket Policy

Children age 3 and under do not require a separate suite ticket for admission into the venue. Any child older will need a ticket even for a Denver Nuggets luxury suite. The Nuggets suites are spacious and a nice option for families seeking privacy and control over their environment.

Frequently Asked Denver Nuggets Questions

Will my Denver Nuggets luxury suite be completely private?

Yes, your luxury suite will be completely private to you and your group.

Is it recommended to pre-order food and beverages for my Nuggets luxury box?

Yes, SEG recommends pre-ordering some food and beverages so that your luxury box is filled with some options for your guests upon their arrival.

Can I order additional tickets for my skybox?

Most Denver Nuggets skyboxes will have a couple of additional tickets available to purchase. Please reach out to your SEG representative to confirm ticket quantity and price.

Please view our Frequently Asked Questions or Contact Us.

We are always happy to assist you.

Nuggets Spotlight

Current NBA Season

Denver took the NBA by storm last season, running through the postseason on route to its first championship in franchise history. The Nuggets lost just four games in the playoffs. Reigning NBA Finals MVP Nikola Jokic is a massive reason why. The center led the postseason in points, rebounds, and assists. Jokic is a two-time league MVP that is widely regarded as the greatest player in basketball currently. Jokic isn‚Äôt the only impact player the Nuggets have though - Jamal Murray, Michael Porter Jr., and Aaron Gordon are all effective. The three combined to average 53.7 points during the 2022-23 regular season. With a dominant core, Denver will certainly be in the mix to repeat as champions.

Ball Arena has perfect luxury amenities for fans. The PoinstBet Club Level has upscale dining, spacious areas and access to the Truly Club and Colorado Social, along with several other... MORE

Denver took the NBA by storm last season, running through the postseason on route to its first championship in franchise history. The Nuggets lost just four games in the playoffs. Reigning NBA Finals MVP Nikola Jokic is a massive reason why. The center led the postseason in points, rebounds, and assists. Jokic is a two-time league MVP that is widely regarded as the greatest player in basketball currently. Jokic isn‚Äôt the only impact player the Nuggets have though - Jamal Murray, Michael Porter Jr., and Aaron Gordon are all effective. The three combined to average 53.7 points during the 2022-23 regular season. With a dominant core, Denver will certainly be in the mix to repeat as champions.

Ball Arena has perfect luxury amenities for fans. The PoinstBet Club Level has upscale dining, spacious areas and access to the Truly Club and Colorado Social, along with several other premium options. Club Lexus has all-inclusive food and beverage, complimentary parking, dedicated concierge service, and a great opportunity to impress clients and employees. More intimate seating is also available. Theatre Boxes have an all-inclusive environment with catered food, plush seating (4-6 people), access to all Denver Nuggets and Colorado Avalanche (NHL) regular season and playoff games, and VIP parking. Suites at Ball Arena are another great option. They include leather seating, TVs, a wet bar, premium parking, early entry, and more.

Past Spotlights

After reaching the Western Conference Finals in the bubble playoffs of 2020, the Nuggets were without Jamal Murray during the last two postseasons. Murray returns to a team that is home to two-time defending NBA MVP Nikola Jokic and is also joined by a healthy Michael Porter Jr. Kentavious Caldwell-Pope is this offseason‚Äôs big addition, and he will help on defense to a team that‚Äôs been the NBA‚Äôs most efficient team on offense over the past five seasons. Aaron Gordon, Jeff Green, and newcomer Bruce Brown also add veteran depth for a team that can contend for a title.

Suites at Ball Arena are the best way to enjoy a night out on the town in Denver for a Nuggets game. Two levels of suites await after you arrive through the VIP entrance. Once in the suite, you‚Äôll have access to exclusive catering options and flatscreen TVs in your spacious suite. When it‚Äôs time for the game, enjoy it in comfort in oversized leather seats. You‚Äôll also have access to the PointsBet Club Level, where there are several lounges and other amenities available.

The MVP is here! Nikola Jokic can do-it-all as the NBA‚Äôs most versatile man in the middle, and he may have to while the Nuggets‚Äô second option recovers. Jamal Murray tore his left ACL toward the end of the 2020-21 season and may be on the mend until playoff time. A stretch Denver has become a fixture in as of late with three consecutive appearances, including a trip to the Western Conference Finals in 2020. Michael Porter Jr. and Aaron Gordon will be called upon to pick up the slack in Murray‚Äôs absence, both of whom made significant strides after Murray‚Äôs injury last season. Re-signing veterans in Will Barton, Austin Rivers, and JaMychal Green will add depth to a team with lofty expectations. Fans can enjoy the suite life at Ball Arena for one game or year-round. Enter the arena early at a VIP entrance while parking the premium lot to enjoy a night of comfort with plush leather seating, HDTVs, and wet bar in the privacy of your own space. Experience Club Lexus for the pinnacle of basketball and high-end luxury. All- inclusive food and beverage plans with upscale dining options await you from the best, cushioned seats in the house. Check out the team take the floor from a special, backstage viewing area while a private concierge tends to your party‚Äôs needs.

Looking for a different team or stadium?

√ó

How Do I Book This Suite?

INSTANT BOOK suites can be purchased online by clicking the INSTANT BOOK button.

Other suites can be purchased by clicking on the button and submitting your request. Our experienced sales staff is standing by and will respond right away.

Call us any time at 800-592-7043 to discuss options or ask any questions.

Catering, Transportation, and Lodging can be handled after your purchase by our world class support team.

√ó

Luxury Suite Costs

What determines how much a suite costs?

Suite pricing varies widely based on a number of variables including league, city, team, opponent, time of day, day of week, and suite location.

Day of Week: In general, suites can be slightly more expensive during weekdays (Monday through Thursday) because those days are ideal for corporations to entertain their clients in a suite.

League: NFL suites are the most expensive by because of the limited number of games (8 home games per team).

Suite Location: While just being in a suite is generally seen as the most desirable and luxurious seat in the building, some stadiums and arenas have multiple suite levels. If this is the case, certain clients are willing to pay a premium to be in a lower level suite that is closest to the action on the field. We will give you details on suite location as we provide you with availability for the game you desire.

Does it pay to wait to book a suite until closer to the event?

With regular tickets, prices will often drop in the days leading up to a game. While every once in a while the same occurs with suites, in general, pricing does not drop before the game. In fact, because of the very limited availability of luxury suites, it is advised to book a suite well in advance, as suites are often not available at the last minute. In addition, in coordinating events for larger groups (suites can hold up to 20 guests or more), it is often necessary to give guests a longer lead time to confirm their availability to attend.

Are there additional expenses I should consider?

If you are hosting guests in your suite, consider allocating enough budget to order catering for your suite. Catering is typically not included in the price of the suite. Suite Experience Group clients typically spend between $1,000-$2,000 for catering, with some clients spending even more if they order significant amounts of alcohol.

Are there discounts if I buy multiple games at once?

Some clients purchase multiple suites in multiple venues at one time. Suite Experience Group can provide special package pricing for clients who buy three or more suites at one time.

How can I maximize my budget?

If you are working within a budget and trying to maximize your spend, we would welcome an opportunity to further discuss your goals for the event and the different options available to you. Please call us at 800-592-7043 or fill out this form to get started. We look forward to the opportunity to help you explore your options in renting a luxury suite.
